message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product. How about we settle at $130?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still looking to save some more. Can you meet me at $125? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go above that.
